description:
In Passion Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls:

- cute dog lover Maya
- ambitious architect Lucy
- charming magician Shannon
- party girl Zelda
- florist with a naughty imagination Nikki
- short-haired psychology enthusiast Robin
- tough cop Seiko
- carnival beauty Aurea 

Which one will become your waifu? ;)
name: Eroblast: Passion Pack
